rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新抗体有望逆转卡芬太尼过量斯克里普斯研究中心的科学家进行的临床前测试表明，一种与强效阿片类药物卡芬太尼结合的单链片段可变 (scFv) 形式的抗体可以逆转卡芬太尼过量的症状。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/New-antibody-shows-promise-in-reversing-carfentanil-overdoses.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/New-antibody-shows-promise-in-reversing-carfentanil-overdoses.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7539b3c2-493f-458e-8121-3cb86f0dd9d2 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 22:27:49 -0400 New antibody shows promise in reversing carfentanil overdoses
微型心脏模型是拯救生命和改善患者治疗效果的关键由希伯来大学 Yaakov Nahmias 教授领导的发现标志着心血管研究的新时代，多腔、自定进度的微型心脏模型是拯救生命和改善患者治疗效果的关键。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Miniature-heart-model-holds-the-key-to- saving-lives-and-enhancing-patent-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Miniature-heart-model-holds-the-key-to- saving-lives-and-enhancing-patent-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=db079b84-c329-4933-848e-fcaafb1208c3 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 22:26:11 -0400 Miniature heart model holds the key to saving lives and enhancing patient outcomes
研究人员开发了一种可扩展的血管工程方法墨尔本大学的研究人员开发了一种快速、廉价且可扩展的方法，用于从天然组织中改造血管。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Researchers-develop-a-scalable-method-for-engineering-blood-vessels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Researchers-develop-a-scalable-method-for-engineering-blood-vessels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cec1feb-4d57-4b19-a212-c6844d8d2cec Mon, 07 Aug 2023 21:59:21 -0400 Researchers develop a scalable method for engineering blood vessels
分析发现抑郁和焦虑与大多数癌症的高风险无关抑郁和焦虑被认为会增加一个人患癌症的风险，但研究结果尚无定论。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Depression-and-anxiety-not-linked-to-higher-risk-for-most-cancers-analysis-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Depression-and-anxiety-not-linked-to-higher-risk-for-most-cancers-analysis-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=52fdc05a-8e54-410c-b1b7-b3878c981756 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 21:45:15 -0400 Depression and anxiety not linked to higher risk for most cancers, analysis finds
噬菌体疗法在治疗顽固的铜绿假单胞菌感染方面显示出希望以色列噬菌体治疗中心 (IPTC) 进行了一项新的国际研究，该研究由哈达萨希伯来大学医学中心的 Ran Nir-Paz 教授和耶路撒冷希伯来大学牙科医学院的 Ronen Hazan 教授领导，使用噬菌体 PASA16富有同情心的基础来治疗顽固的铜绿假单胞菌感染，已显示出可喜的结果，成功率为 86.6%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Phage-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-tough-Pseudomonas-aeruginosa-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Phage-therapy-shows-promise-in-treating-tough-Pseudomonas-aeruginosa-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b988455-42b2-4372-bd65-77559bf83596 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 21:39:32 -0400 Phage therapy shows promise in treating tough Pseudomonas aeruginosa infections
对接触者进行预防性结核病治疗可以挽救生命和金钱研究人员表示，对感染者的接触者进行预防性结核病治疗可以显着减少死亡人数，并节省资金。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Preventive-TB-treatment-for-contacts-could-save-lives-and-money.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Preventive-TB-treatment-for-contacts-could-save-lives-and-money.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d0cd94b4-6043-40d6-bccb-96cb9e48520a Mon, 07 Aug 2023 21:38:04 -0400 Preventive TB treatment for contacts could save lives and money
EULAR 发布 SLE 和 SSc 非药物治疗新建议系统性红斑狼疮（SLE）是一种以多系统受累为特征的慢性自身免疫性疾病。系统性硬化症 (SSc) 或硬皮病是另一种影响血管、皮肤和内脏器官的风湿性自身免疫性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/EULAR-releases-new-recommendations-for-non-pharmacological-management-of-SLE-and-SSc.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/EULAR-releases-new-recommendations-for-non-pharmacological-management-of-SLE-and-SSc.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2155345-1868-4eb9-b138-b40d7e7eb62c Mon, 07 Aug 2023 21:35:32 -0400 EULAR releases new recommendations for non-pharmacological management of SLE and SSc
研究发现黑人早产率高于非西班牙裔白人西北医学的一项新研究报告称，非西班牙裔黑人的早产率明显高于非西班牙裔白人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Study-finds-higher-rate-of-pre-term-births-among-Blacks-than-non-Hispanic-white-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Study-finds-higher-rate-of-pre-term-births-among-Blacks-than-non-Hispanic-white-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37e0db9e-8653-44d9-becd-eef949741371 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 15:07:37 -0400 Study finds higher rate of pre-term births among Blacks than non-Hispanic white individuals
自付费用是治疗阿片类药物使用障碍的障碍根据范德比尔特大学医学院卫生政策系助理教授、主要作者 Ashley Leech 博士今天在《美国医学会杂志》内科医学杂志上发表的一篇研究信，大多数被诊断患有阿片类药物使用障碍的人都没有服用推荐的药物，甚至更少的人仍在接受治疗。中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Out-of-pocket-costs-a-barrier-to-treatment-for-opioid-use-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/Out-of-pocket-costs-a-barrier-to-treatment-for-opioid-use-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e6a53929-5873-4bfb-9466-b40cb86e16e1 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 14:59:27 -0400 Out-of-pocket costs a barrier to treatment for opioid use disorder
NCI 资助研究驱动 ER+ 乳腺癌的潜在细胞机制美国国家癌症研究所 (NCI) 向 Sanford Burnham Prebys 的研究人员提供了为期 5 年、价值 270 万美元的资助，用于研究和阐明导致最常见乳腺癌的潜在细胞机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/NCI-funds-study-to-investigate-the-underlying-cellular-mechanisms-that-drive-ER2b-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230807/NCI-funds-study-to-investigate-the-underlying-cellular-mechanisms-that-drive-ER2b-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d4b10612-ec81-4313-b15f-9a1c4abc10e7 Mon, 07 Aug 2023 14:28:06 -0400 NCI funds study to investigate the underlying cellular mechanisms that drive ER+ breast cancer
